name: Taquitos Mexicanos
description: Four corn tortillas, stuffed with chicken or beef fillings, topped with lettuce, , sour cream and pico de gallo, served with Mexican rice and beans

name: Carnitas
description: Fried pork served with Mexican rice and beans, and salad

name: Special Dinner
description: One tamale, enchilada, chile relleno, taco and chalupa, served with Mexican rice, and beans

name: Chimichanga
description: Stuffed flour tortilla with a choice of beef chunks or spiced chicken deep fried to a golden brown, topped with cheese sauce, lettuce, sour cream, and pico de gallo, served with Mexican rice and beans

name: Chimichanga Pancho
description: Stuffed flour tortilla with cooked shrimp, saut√©ed onions, tomatoes and green peppers, deep fried to golden brown, topped with cheese sauce, lettuce, sour cream, and pico de gallo, served with rice and beans

name: Quesadilla Rellena
description: Large flour tortilla filled with beans and beef or chicken. server with Mexican rice and salad

name: Burger Real
description: A freshly made juicy burger, grilled and served on a bun, with lettuce onion and tomato, pickles, mayonnaise, and mustard, served with french fries

name: Enchilada Supremas
description: Four rolled corn tortillas, one of each, beef, bean, chicken, cheese, topped with enchilada sauce, lettuce, tomatoes sour cream

name: Enchilada Rancheras
description: Three cheese enchiladas, topped with cooked shredded pork, tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, lettuce and sour cream

name: Enchilada Verdes
description: Three cheese enchiladas, topped with shredded beef and green tomatilln sauce served with rino and beans
